data.title: Great Park!
data.text: This is a great park with many activities. We went during the Halloween event. This is a great big park with fun activities planned. Great job Largo Parks and Rec!

data.title: Slickdognet1@2
data.text: Beautiful centrally located to Largo downtown and the beach access road 'Saturday night live in the park is the best solution for getting out with the local area  .

data.title: Walk in the Park
data.text: My wife and I take our two dogs for a walk  here at least once a week. The park is nice and quiet, well shaded from the Florida sun. The park is pet friendly, has watering fountains for both pets and humans. Park has poop bags to pick up after your pet, has benches and BBQ grilles around the walk way. Park has a distance marker for the walkers. Plenty of space for the kids to run and play, kites etc. You are next to the library,bath rooms, etc Take the kids, dogs, get a book and relax outdoors in the fresh air. Great place  to visit.DAND

data.title: Great family spot
data.text: This location holds many events throughout the year including fireworks, amazing Christmas lights ( yes I said Christmas ) and monthly minature trains that offer rides. Lots of festivals year round along with a nice play area for the kids. Check it out at Largo, Fl website

data.title: Kid's Haven
data.text: Put this park on your child's or grandchild's local adventure list.  It is surely a go-to attraction that ours love. The playground offers plenty of excellent equipment to enjoy the mild Florida temperatures and opportunities for climbing, running, and exploring.  We found the equipment to be surprisingly unique and saw children of all ages actively involved in fun times.  The park was easy to find and quite a gem.  Better yet, here's a great place for kids to exercise more than just their fingers which are so used to doing electronic games!

data.title: Lots of green space!
data.text: I enjoy the walking path and that this park is easy to get to, but doesn't feel crowded. It has a HUGE play ground area, lots of picnic spots, and a wide open field great for frisbee.

data.title: Great family fun times
data.text: This is one of Pinellas County's best parks for children. It's located next to the library so you can double up on a day out. The Largo Cultural center is in the same complex so there is also an opportunity there for more fun. The park is large and offers lots of wandering outdoor exploring. They have a miniature train that runs on the weekends that kids love! The play area has astro-turf so seems to be safer than most parks. There are several play areas which are designated for certain ages. LOTS of varied things to try.  Best new addition... baby/toddler swings with attached adult seats. We come here often but avoid during summer months (school out) as it is way too busy.

data.title: Day at the park
data.text: Wonderful playground for your kids or grandchildren. Lots to do. Nice equipment. Lots of space for activities.

data.title: Great
data.text: Park is nice and big. Lots of space to walk your dog or play kickball. Daughter loves the playground.

data.title: Nice park!
data.text: Largo Central Park is a nice,well maintained park and is well known for it's Christmas lights.They have many shows and events there also.A great place to sit in the shade,read a book,walk around the park and admire the nice landscape,a playground,statues and areas designated as memorials and they have an outdoor excercise area with unique equiptment that makes working out fun!.There is a library and a theater on the premises ,so there is always something going on there.Go to the City of Largo calender of events and there will always be listings for Largo Central Park.I recommend visiting the park

data.title: great great park!
data.text: Love this place even though it is close to Lincolnshire prison, inmates are elderly and friendly.  It great for a getaway! (sic). Dog friendly, always have things going on. Great walkways. Kiddie train rides 1st Sunday of the month.

data.title: A hidden gem in Largo.
data.text: Have been here many times. A large outdoor playground for children and assorted exercise equipment for grownups all free. You can also visit the public library attached to park or the cultural center which has many theatre shows. This is another great family choice during the Christmas holidays, with the light display, train rides for kids,. There is a large bonfire and you can purchase, hot chocolate, hot dogs to roast or items for s'mores. A very affordable activity for family. We always enjoy this outing.

data.title: Right in the middle of town!!
data.text: Lovely walking, dog friendly, home of the Cultural Art Center, across from the new library, great playground, beautiful Christmas display with lighting and vendors. Grownups can ride the little train!

data.title: Largo Central Park
data.text: We love Largo Central Park! Great family park! Once a month train rides, tons of events, very clean, and tons of playground!

data.title: great place to take kids
data.text: free train rides on first weekend of every month, lots of space for kids to run and quality equipment to play on.

data.title: Family Friendly
data.text: I have lived in the Pinellas area all my life and have enjoyed seeing the park grow and become more family friendly. Definitely recommend visiting there.

data.title: Nice Playground
data.text: A large park in the middle of Largo close to the library and a cultural center.  There is a good size playground enclosed by a fence with something for kids of various ages.  Although it can get quite crowded on weekends.  I have yet to experience the small train ride, but hear it is great.

data.title: The Pride of Largo!
data.text: The City of Largo can pride itself in providing some of the nicest parks for families to enjoy in Pinellas County!   Largo Central Park offers something for everyone...even Fido!  Acres of beautiful trees and plants, peaceful walkways, realistic bronze statues of playful children throughout the park, a beautiful water fountain, picnic areas, diverse children's playground, even a mini steam train that families can ride on at least once a month.  In addition, the Largo Cultural Center is located there and provides regularly scheduled plays, musicians, events.  There is always some specially themed family event sponsored in Largo Central Park attracting people from afar. Largo Central Park is magical at Christmas time with lighted displays, lighted trees, hot chocolate and snack booths.  Largo Central Park is the heartbeat of Largo!

data.title: Great family retreat
data.text:
With large open spaces, pet friendly, multiple covered rental spaces for grilling and dining, the park is very popular. A large kid-friendly fenced play area is heavily used and there is plenty of free parking.

The park is also home of the "Largo Central Railroad", a club of miniature train builders who offer rides to children   (over 1yr) and adults. Donations are recommended. These trains are very cool, and the ride often even includes riding through a tunnel. Super Great for children!
